invention-title: Method for treating zinc smelting acid leaching residues through gaseous suspension roasting reduction smelting
一种气态悬浮焙烧还原熔炼处理锌冶炼酸浸渣的方法

abstract.p: The invention relates to a method for treating zinc smelting acid leaching residues through gaseous suspension roasting reduction smelting. Adopted equipment comprises a CO generator system, a fluidized suspension roasting reduction system, an electric furnace melting separation system or a screening magnetic separation system, a waste heat and dust collection system and a flue gas treatment system. According to the method, hydrogen and other strong reducing gases prepared through water gas or natural gas cracking and other methods are used for treating zinc smelting acid leaching residues and other zinc-containing materials of zinc carbonate oxidized ore, the coal consumption is 20% or above lower than that of a rotary kiln, the carbon emission is 20%-50% lower than that of a similar rotary kiln, and compared with other methods or equipment, the method is more environmentally friendly and saves more energy. The gaseous fluidized suspension roasting reduction smelting system of the method is higher in treatment capacity, and capacity expansion and transformation of an acid leaching residue treatment system of a zinc smelting system are better facilitated. The reduction temperature of the gaseous fluidized suspension roasting reduction smelting system only needs to be 100-500 DEG C, the reaction temperature of other methods and equipment needs to be maintained at 1100-1300 DEG C, and compared with other methods and equipment, more energy is saved.

本发明涉及一种气态悬浮焙烧还原熔炼处理锌冶炼酸浸渣的方法，所采用的设备包括CO发生炉系统、流态化悬浮焙烧还原系统、电炉熔融分离系统或者筛分磁选系统、余热和收尘系统和烟气处理系统。本方法使用的是水煤气或者天然气裂解等方法制备的氢气等强还原性气体处理锌冶炼酸浸渣、碳酸锌氧化矿的其他含锌物料，煤耗比回转窑低20%以上，其碳排放比同类的回转窑低20‑50%，比其他方法或者设备更环保更节能。本发明方法的气态流态化悬浮焙烧还原熔炼系统处理能力更高，更有利于锌冶炼系统酸浸渣处理系统扩能改造。本发明中的气态流态化悬浮焙烧还原熔炼系统还原温度只需要100~500℃，而其他方法和设备反应温度需维持1100~1300℃，比其他方法和设备更加节能。
